prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a floating cloud with a mischievous grin and glowing eyes.
Generate a spooky Pokemon that has a round shape and emits a purple mist around it.
Imagine a shadowy creature with a playful personality, lurking in dark places and surprising trainers.
Make a Pokemon that is primarily black with hints of purple, known for its ghostly abilities.
Design a Pokemon that floats and uses ghost-type moves, with distinctive glaring eyes and a haunting smile.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a floating ball of gas, with a cheeky expression and a spooky aura.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of ghostly mischief, with a round body and ghostly features.
